code: import React,{useState,useContext}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{AuthContext}from'../context/AuthContext';import api from'../utils/api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AuthPage=()=>{const[isSignup,setIsSignup]=useState(false);const[name,setName]=useState('');const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const{login}=useContext(AuthContext);const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();setError('');let res;if(isSignup){res=await api.post('/auth/signup',{name,email,password});}else{res=await api.post('/auth/login',{email,password});}if(res.token){login(res.user,res.token);navigate('/');}else{setError(res.message||(isSignup?'Signup failed':'Login failed'));}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"form-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:isSignup?'Signup':'Login'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[isSignup&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:isSignup?'Signup':'Login'}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"error",children:error})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setIsSignup(!isSignup),style:{marginTop:'1rem'},children:isSignup?'Already have an account? Login':"Don't have an account? Signup"})]});};export default AuthPage;
